plot outline: Everyone among the youth might have come across some kind of register marriages within their friend circle. Statistics show that register marriages have hugely risen in the previous years. The stories relating such marriages often seems interesting with a lot of humor and thrilling chases involved. Here we try to discuss the multiple angles relating such a marriage including the pain caused for the families involved and the reasons relating such decisions. The span of the story is from the decision of getting married to the point of marriage and which is completely filled with humor and entertainment throughout.
title: Ladoo
plot: Vinu and Angeline, a couple in love, decide to elope and get married. But when a bunch of friends gets involved, the plan itself starts spiraling out of control. The chaos that ensues forms the crux of _Ladoo_ (qv).

Everyone among the youth might have come across some kind of register marriages within their friend circle. Statistics show that register marriages have hugely risen in the previous years. The stories relating such marriages often seems interesting with a lot of humor and thrilling chases involved. Here we try to discuss the multiple angles relating such a marriage including the pain caused for the families involved and the reasons relating such decisions. The span of the story is from the decision of getting married to the point of marriage and which is completely filled with humor and entertainment throughout.::Arungeorge K David
